title: Deadly floods shook Europe. Is it ready for future climate change-related disasters?
content:
1. Deadly floods shook Europe. Is it ready for future climate change-related disasters?  NBC News
  2. At least 93 dead, 1000 missing after disaster flood in Europe l GMA  ABC News
  3. Europe Flooding Deaths Pass 125, and Scientists See Fingerprints of Climate Change  The New York Times
  4. Opinion: The climate crisis can't be stopped, we must adapt  Deutsche Welle
  5. Record rainfall leaves over 120 dead in western Europe, devastating parts of Germany  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ヨーロッパを震撼させた致命的な洪水。今後の気候変動による災害への備えはできているのか？
致命的洪水震撼了欧洲。它为未来与气候变化有关的灾害做好准备了吗？
致命的洪水震撼了歐洲。它爲未來與氣候變化有關的災害做好準備了嗎？
